name: Mini Golf Stars! Space Golf Game
name_original: Mini Golf Stars! Space Golf Game
description:
Welcome to the most addicting mini golf game in the world. Play the best casual sports game with amazing 3D graphics. Test your mini golf skills in Mini Golf Stars! Space Golf Game
.

FEATURES 
*** Play 54 Pars in 4 Different gorgeous looking courses...
*** Amazing 3D visuals. 
***Immersive Soundtracks. 
*** Realistic Mini Golf physics.
*** Challenge friends

Fore! Test your mini golf skills to see just how many hole-in-ones, pars, or birdies you can get in this game.
